quotes.quote: I'm not a great cook, but I'm good at making a mean stew.
quotes.author: Gordon Ramsay

quotes.quote: All our dreams can come true, if we have the courage to pursue them.
quotes.author: Walt Disney

quotes.quote: It's not that I'm so smart, it's just that I stay with problems longer.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.quote: Everything you can imagine is real.
quotes.author: Pablo Picasso

quotes.quote: I am not a product of my circumstances. I am a product of my decisions.
quotes.author: Stephen Covey

quotes.quote: There is only one way to avoid criticism: do nothing, say nothing, and be nothing.
quotes.author: Aristotle

quotes.quote: Donâ€™t limit yourself. Many people limit themselves to what they think they can do. You can go as far as your mind lets you. What you believe, remember, you can achieve.
quotes.author: Mary Kay Ash
